## Description {#details}

Base class for aggregate constants (with operands).

These constants are aggregates of other constants, which are stored as operands.

Subclasses are <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantstruct">ConstantStruct</a></em>, <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantarray">ConstantArray</a></em>, and <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantvector">ConstantVector</a></em>.


:::info
Some subclasses of <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantdata">ConstantData</a></em> are semantically aggregates – such as <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantdataarray">ConstantDataArray</a></em> – but are not subclasses of this because they use operands.
:::

Definition at line 402 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/constants-h">Constants.h</a>.
